prompts: Create a small, green Pokemon with large leaves and a cheerful expression.
I want a Pokemon that embodies nature, featuring vibrant yellow and green colors.
Generate a cute, flower-like creature that thrives in grassy areas.
Make a Pokemon with a playful personality and a whimsical design.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a plant but has a friendly, round face.
Design a tiny Pokemon that loves to hide among the flowers and grass.
Show me a Pokemon that represents growth and vitality with a unique shape.
